job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Client located headquartered in Denver, Colorado is seeking a 100% remote Data Scientist for a long term contract position. This position will participate on a small team that will work with medical, claims, and policy related data that comes in a variety of formats – structured and unstructured - to generate insights and embed artificial intelligence into applications. Required: -Python. -Strong modeling skills. -Knowledge of BASH. -SQL coding. Desired: -Data library experience (spaCy, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.). -Experience working with insurance data (medical records, insurance claims, policy data). -API development. -Google Cloud Platform.
